summary: Multiple major announcements across the Base ecosystem today, including Jesse Pollak's strategic reflections, Base leaderboards launch, and Bankr's new token launcher.

findings.summary: Jesse shared 3 key learnings from 2025 and teased Base mission/vision/strategy announcement for next week
keyPoints: Base was 'too far in the future' with creator economy focus - needs to refocus on traders and builders first
Trading is Base's biggest growth opportunity - needs to become 'most trusted, liquid, powerful trading economy'
Decentralizing Base leadership and empowering ecosystem voices is critical priority
Base mission/vision/strategy to be shared next week

findings.summary: Launched Leaderboards on base.dev to bring automatic distribution to top apps
keyPoints: Leaderboards now live on base.dev, starting with Mini Apps in Base app
Designed for social sharing with new flex cards
Apps must register on base.dev to be eligible
Base Verify reached 200k+ verifications (helps apps confirm real users)

findings.summary: Bankr token launcher is live with improved fee structure for devs + LLM keys coming
keyPoints: New token launcher removes third-party fee - devs earn ~14% more per swap
Total swap fee stays 1.2% for traders
LLM keys coming soon: agents can auto-fund API costs from trading fees
OpenClaw integration planned for LLM cost context
Hiring devrel to onboard agent developers

trends: Agentic economy is a major focus across all three accounts
Base doubling down on trading/finance use cases over creator economy
Self-funding agents (via trading fees) emerging as key theme
Decentralization of Base ecosystem leadership accelerating
actionItems: Watch for Base strategy announcement next week
Consider OpenClaw integration with Bankr LLM keys when available
Monitor agentic economy developments (8004 standard, OpenClaw partnerships)
